subject: [Mhln] Creative Suite 3 Design
body:
I cry every chance I get.
For precious friends hid in death's dateless night.
If help and salvation are to come, they can only come from the children, for the children are the makers of men.
Those who prepared for all the emergencies of life beforehand may equip themselves at the expense of joy.
Did you ever observe to whom the accidents happen? Chance favors only the prepared mind.
A torchlight procession marching down your throat.
In this world nothing can be said to be certain, except death and taxes.
Old men are dangerous: it doesn't matter to them what is going to happen to the world.
Ours is the only country deliberately founded on a good idea.
No one is as angry as the person who is wrong.
A man is not old as long as he is seeking something.
Life... It tends to respond to our outlook, to shape itself to meet our expectations.
Give me four years to teach the children and the seed I have sown will never be uprooted.
It is the direction and not the magnitude which is to be taken into consideration.
Assassination is the perquisite of princes.
A legend is an old man with a cane known for what he used to do. I'm still doing it.
To see your drama clearly is to be liberated from it.
No scoundrel is so stupid as to not find a reason for his vile conduct.
The consumer isn't a moron. She is your wife.
